MILLENNIAL IMAGES FOLDER
========================

Add your millennial-themed images here.

Image Naming:
- Name your images as: 1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, etc.
- Or use .png extension: 1.png, 2.png, 3.png, etc.
- You can add up to 10 images (or more if you modify the code)

Image Suggestions:
- Young professionals in modern offices
- Startup team meetings
- Remote workers at cafes
- Coworking spaces
- Tech-savvy millennials
- Social media influencers
- Casual office environments
- Team brainstorming sessions

The carousel will automatically loop through all images infinitely!
